titleStmt.title: The most pleasant history of Reynard the fox. Entered according to order.
Reynard the Fox.
titleStmt.author: J. S. (John Shirley), fl. 1680-1702, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Conyers, and are to be sold by J. Blare at the Looking-glass on London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: A free adaptation and translation of: "Le roman de Renart", in prose; attributed by Wing to John Shirley (fl. 1680-1702), who published a version in heroic verse in 1681 with a slightly different title.
With title page woodcut repeated on p.[24]. Verso of t.p. contains square woodcut of black bird with initials I C in upper corners.
O copy filmed on Early English Books reel 1784 imperfect? Page 23 ends with: Thus ends the first part.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
